channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bulk Delete Users by Email
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bulk Delete Users by Email

item.title: CVE-2022-4267|2024-08-03T01:34:50.000Z -- unknown -- bulk%20delete%20users%20by%20email
item.description: The Bulk Delete Users by Email WordPress plugin through 1.2 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting

item.title: CVE-2022-4266|2024-08-03T01:34:49.994Z -- unknown -- bulk%20delete%20users%20by%20email
item.description: The Bulk Delete Users by Email WordPress plugin through 1.2 does not have CSRF check when deleting users, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete non admin users by knowing their email via a CSRF attack
